game.title: The Quest for the Sacred Amulet
game.objective: Deliver the Sacred Amulet to High Elder Alaric
game.description: In the land of Elyria, you must find and deliver the stolen Sacred Amulet to its guardian, High Elder Alaric. Your journey will take you through the Lustrous Mountains and the Whispering Caves.
game.reward: Experience points, gold coins, a magical artifact, and a rare potion

task.description: Search the Northern Peak of the Lustrous Mountains for the hidden Mountain Pass Key. Watch out for the ice beasts that guard it.
Use the Mountain Pass Key to gain access to the Whispering Caves. Beware of the traps and listen carefully for clues.

task.objective: Retrieve the Sacred Amulet from the Altar Room
task.description: Locate the altar where the Sacred Amulet is being guarded. Overcome the guardian and claim the artifact.
